definition: unlawful premeditated killing of a human being by a human being, alter so as to make unrecognizable
details:
noun
- unlawful premeditated killing of a human being by a human being
= synonyms: execution
- a collection of crows
= example: a collection of crows
verb
- alter so as to make unrecognizable
= example: alter so as to make unrecognizable
= synonyms: mangle, mutilate
- kill intentionally and with premeditation
= example: kill intentionally and with premeditation
= synonyms: hit
